item.title: Getting Started with Hugo
item.description: ENV : OS : Ubuntu 18.04 Desktop Hugo : v0.93 Step 1. Install Hugo Packages Goto hugo releases and download the appropriate version for your OS and architecture. Open your bowser to Dowload Packages. (Here is hugo_0.93.0_Linux-64bit.deb) Verify it’s install Success. $ hugo version Step 2. Build the Docs Hugo has it’s own example site which happens to also be the documentation site you are reading right now.
